data.title: HP to cut about 6,000 jobs by 2028, ramps up AI efforts
data.description: HP's teams focused on product development, internal operations and customer support will be impacted by the job cuts, CEO Enrique Lores said during a media briefing call. "We expect this initiative will create $1 billion in gross run rate savings over three years," Lores added. The company laid off an additional ‌1,000 to 2,000 employees in February, as part of a previously announced restructuring plan.
data.keywords: HP Inc, Enrique Lores, product ‌development, price increases, internal operations
